summary: Texas A&M University, founded in 1876, is a large public research university in College Station, Texas. It started as an agricultural and mechanical college and became the first public higher education institution in Texas. Over time, it grew and expanded, becoming a land-grant, sea-grant, and space-grant institution. The university has a big campus with over 130 degree programs and more than 1,000 student groups. It's known for its military college status and traditions. Students are called Aggies, and they participate in various sports in the Southeastern Conference.
title: Texas A&M University
